name: Giannaki Rides
description:
Giannaki rides, the game. Collect souvlakia, slalom between enemies and hit the highest score possible! This game is specially created as a Christmas gift and is dedicated to Gianna, who has a passion for Chopper bikes, Fortnite, Greek food and Basketball (but who really hates cockroaches)...  so Merry Christmas, and I hope you have fun! :D

Music: full credits to the artist DoubleCruiser
